parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns marker size. This command is identical to [[getMarkerSize]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''markerSize''' markerName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [a-axis, b-axis], where:
* a-axis: [[Number]] - 1/2 width of marker
* b-axis: [[Number]] - 1/2 height of marker
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mSize = [[markerSize]] "Marker1";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerSize]], [[setMarkerSizeLocal]]
</value></part></template>
